name: Foxcrate
description:
You are the newest employee of the delivery company, Foxcrate. Can you make it through an entire week and deliver all the customers' packages on time?

Foxcrate is a roguelite delivery game in which you have a limited time each day to deliver all packages to the correct houses across the map. Plan your route carefully and load the packages into the truck with efficiency. Each day will add more packages and time, but you must also select an additional effect (such as packages requiring signatures, or heavy traffic areas). If you can make it through 7 days of deliveries, you win!
